text: Reba McEntire (born March 28, 1955) is an American country music singer, songwriter and actress. She has many hit songs. She acted in a TV comedy called "Reba". ==Early life== McEntire was born in Kiowa, Oklahoma. She was raised in Denison, Texas. ==Albums== A list of albums from 1977 to 2010: * Reba McEntire (1977) * Out Of My Dream (1979) * Feel The Fire (1980) * Heart To Heart (1981) * Unlimited (1982) * Behind The Scene * Just A Little Love * My Kind Of Country * Have I Got A Deal For You * Reba Nell McEntire * What Am I Gonna Do About You * Whoever's In New England * Merry Christmas To You * Reba McEntire's Greatest Hits * The Last One To Know * Reba * Reba Live * Sweet Sixteen * Rumour Has It * For My Broken Heart * It's Your Call * Greatest Hits Vol.2 * Oklahoma Girl * Read My Mind * Starting Over * What If It's You * If You See Him * The Secret of Giving: A Christmas Collection * So Good Together * I'll Be * Greatest Hits Vol.3: I'm A Survivor * 20th Century Masters: The Christmas Collection * Room To Breathe * Reba's #1's * 20th Century Masters: The Millenium Collection * Reba Duets (2007) * 50 Greatest Hits (2008) * Keep On Loving You (2009) * All The Woman I Am (2010) ==References== ==Other websites== * Reba McEntire official website Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Singer-songwriters from Texas Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Musicians from Oklahoma Category:Singers from Oklahoma Category:Actors from Oklahoma Category:Actors from Texas Category:People from Denison, Texas Category:Big Machine Records artists Category:MCA Records artists
title: Reba McEntire
